    • discardLeaderCard

      public boolean discardLeaderCard​(int leaderCardIndex)
      Performs the action of discarding a leader card. After it is discarded, the player will earn a VP
      Parameters:
      leaderCardIndex - index of the card to discard
      Returns:
      true if can be removed, false otherwise

    • canBuyDevCardFromMarket

      public boolean canBuyDevCardFromMarket​(int cardMarketIndex)
      This method is used to know whether a player can buy a given card in the card market. It applies the discounts from the leader cards if present
      Parameters:
      cardMarketIndex - index of the card to buy in the market
      Returns:
      true if can be bought, false otherwise

    • getDevCardCostDiscounted

      Parameters:
      cardMarketIndex - index of the card to discount
      Returns:
      the cost of the DevCard discounted

    • devCardsPlayerCanBuy

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> devCardsPlayerCanBuy()
      Returns a list of cards player can buy from the DevCardMarket. It is used to know which of the cards in the market player can buy before he actually buys it
      Returns:
      a list of indexes of cards that player can potentially buy

    • canConvertWhiteMarble

      public boolean canConvertWhiteMarble​(ResourceType resourceToConvert, int bufferIndex)
      This method evaluates if a marble can be converted. Should be invoked after selecting a row or a column from the market because after that call White Marbles are already deleted if player does not own convertWhiteCards
      Parameters:
      resourceToConvert - type of resource in which player wants to convert the white marble
      bufferIndex - index of the marble to evaluate
      Returns:
      true or false

    • convertWhiteMarble

      public void convertWhiteMarble​(ResourceType resourceType, int bufferIndex)
      This method converts a given marble into an other
      Parameters:
      resourceType - type of resource in which player wants to convert the white marble
      bufferIndex - index of the marble in the buffer player wants to convert

    • canUseDevCards

      public boolean canUseDevCards​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> productionSlotsIndexes)
      Parameters:
      productionSlotsIndexes - list of the indexes of the slots player wants to use for production
      Returns:
      true if the combo is valid, false otherwise

      public boolean canPlaceDevCardOnDevSlot​(DevCard devCard, int devCardSlotIndex)
      Parameters:
      devCard - card player wants to place
      devCardSlotIndex - index of the Development Slot in which player wants to put the bought card
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
